haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Ltn Kristof Bahr
Fw Detlef Schwarzer
Fw Ruprecht Hess

 The mission was flown from Balatre aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 28/07/1916 near Balatre Sub.
A Airco D.H.2 of No 32 Squadron RFC was brought down by Ruprecht Hess of Jasta 16b.
Norris Callthorpe was killed in action.
Ruprecht Hess was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 28/07/1916 near Lachalade.
A Nieuport 11.C1 of Esc N.124 Lafayette was brought down by Tobias Platz of Jasta 16b.
S/Lt Jeremy Ducourant was killed in action.
Tobias Platz was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 28/07/1916 near Varennes-en-Argonne.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc N.31 was brought down by Benjamin Singermann of Jasta 16b.
Cne Justin Ollier was killed in action.
Benjamin Singermann was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.

On 28/07/1916 near Witry-les-Reims.
A F.E.2b of Esc 227 was brought down by Ludwig Closterman of Jasta 16b.
Sergt Rene Lacorne was killed in action.
S/Lt Jeremy Laffite was killed in action.
Ludwig Closterman was  flying a Halberstadt D.II.
narrative: We are attacked by a lone DH2.  Madness!  I kill the pilot but decline the victory, as my wellow pilots had already done most of the damage.  Hess is awarded the victory instead.
